about_the_game:
Welcome to New Year's Surprise! 🎁

Click, collect, and upgrade as you dive into a cozy, fun-filled New Year adventure. With charming visuals, cheerful music, and cozy winter vibes, New Year's Surprise is the perfect short and fun game to enjoy during the holiday season. 🎄✨

🛷 Key Features

  • Unwrap Gifts: Click to open festive presents and uncover delightful surprises! 🎁

  • Meet Santa & Friends: Enjoy charming holiday characters who bring the New Year magic to life. 🧑‍🎄⛄

  • Upgrade and Progress: Unlock upgrades that boost your rewards and make the fun even more exciting.

  • Festive Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a snowy, colorful world full of joy and celebration.

  • Easy and Addictive Gameplay: Perfect for relaxing, clicking, and enjoying the New Year vibes.

🎉 Why You’ll Love It

  • Holiday Spirit: Celebrate New Year with cheerful visuals, magical sounds, and endless surprises.

  • Perfect for Casual Players: Simple gameplay that anyone can pick up and enjoy.

  • Play at Your Own Pace: Whether for a few minutes or hours, the fun never stops.

Join Santa and friends, unwrap joy, and start your New Year with a surprise in this addictive clicker adventure. Let the holiday magic begin! 🎁❄️

name: New Year's Surprise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz +
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: New Year's Surprise is a festive clicker game where you open gifts, unlock upgrades, and enjoy cheerful surprises with Santa and friends in a snowy wonderland! 🎁✨
